title: Jefferson Park / Gladstone Park Studio Heated
posting_body: PLEASE CALL 773-992-0693 (WE DO NOT check EMAIL regularly)
Large 2 Room Studio / Sunny / 2nd Flr (top) / Heated / Hardwood Floors / Recently Updated / Very Quiet Building / Cats Ok / Laundry in the Building /Backyard Space.
Near the Intersection of Milwaukee / Austin / Milwaukee
Applicants should have strong credit (720 or BETTER GREATLY PREFERRED) /
Proof of income needs to be verifiable and meet certain threshold / Proof of savings 4K+ greatly preferred
